heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny, except variable clouds northeast, and in the Champlain Valley. Valley highs in the low to mid 50s for southeastern valleys, and in the broad valleys west; mid 40s to around 50 elsewhere. North to northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, and gusting to 30 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear, except becoming so northeast. Lows from the mid 20s to lower 30s, with some mid 30 near Lake Champlain, and lower 20s in northern cold hollows. North winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph early.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny. Highs from the upper 40s to mid 50s, with mid to upper 50s in southeastern valleys, and in the broad valleys west. North winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the morning.
